title: This is the mail
creator_credit: Australia Post, M Murphy and P. Sutton
brief_description: Provides an overview of the newly built Sydney Mail Exchange; the automatic letter sorting equipment designed to increase the speed and efficiency of mail handling, mail sorting, stamping, conveyancing and the eventual delivery.
